entry.title: Thursday: Showers or drizzle. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A few showers or periods of drizzle ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches. Amount 2 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Fog patches. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Thursday 4 May 2023
